description: This table contains the questions and answers for questionnaire answer records. It also includes audit information such as when the question was answered and by whom.

columns.name: ANSWER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the questionnaire answer record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line count of the answers in the questionnaire record.

columns.name: QUEST_LINE_NUM
columns.description: The line number for the question for this record.

columns.name: QUEST_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user associated with this record.

columns.name: QUESTION_INSTANT
columns.description: Stores the instant a question was answered.

columns.name: VARCHAR_ANSWER
columns.description: For questions of networked or category response types where the linked INI and item is string (aka varchar) based, this column will hold either a record ID or category ID. These are useful for linking directly to other tables such as CLARITY_SER for provider-linked questions, or ZC tables for category response types.   If you are unsure what types of records these IDs hold, consult CL_QQUEST_OVTM for the question ID in the QUEST_ID column and use the RESP_INI and RESP_ITEM columns.

columns.name: NUMERIC_ANSWER
columns.description: For questions of networked or category response types where the linked INI and item is numeric (integer) based, this column holds either a record ID or category ID.

columns.name: FLOAT_ANSWER
columns.description: The answer to the question for this record converted into a floating point value.

columns.name: IS_NULL
columns.description: Specifies if there was no response to a question (set to 1 - Yes).

columns.name: QUESTION_SDI
columns.description: The SmartData identifier of the SmartData element that this patient-entered custom history question uses.

columns.name: QUESN_SDI_FILED_YN
columns.description:
Whether the response to this custom history question has been filed to the patient's history.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DATETIME_ANSWER
columns.description: Stores questionnaire answer data in a datetime format that includes hours and seconds.

columns.name: TIME_ANSWER
columns.description: The answer to the question for this record, formatted as a time value. This is the preferred column for reporting on answers to questions with the response type (LQL 110) of 3-Time.  Source: HQA 120

columns.name: SCORE_STD_ERR
columns.description: The standard error on the score calculated by the computerized adaptive testing (CAT) algorithm

columns.name: DOC_INFO_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of a document uploaded for a question.

columns.name: FOL_UP_PAR_QUEST_ID
columns.description: The question ID (LQL) of the parent question for which this follow-up question is answered.

columns.name: PAT_LOC_DOC_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the drawing record (DCS) submitted by the patient in the locale in which he answered the question if the locale is different from the base locale.

columns.name: ANSWER_SEVERITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The severity level of an answer. Calculated using the thresholds defined for the question that was answered.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Normal


Abnormal


Critical
